headline: Radiology Information System Market Competitive Landscape Report 2025 Featuring Top Players - Koninklijke Philips, Siemens Healthcare, Oracle, McKesson, GE HealthCare
summary: The global Radiology Information Systems (RIS) market is set to expand significantly, projecting an increase from USD 1.16 billion in 2025 to USD 2.17 billion by 2033, fueled by an 8.14% CAGR. Key drivers include advancements in health IT, growing RIS adoption for workflow management, and a surge in demand for precise diagnoses and integrated health systems globally. RIS enhances radiology departments by managing medical images and data, boosting patient management and decision-making efficiency
